review: I have a Sony flat screen (with an HDMI port), which is a few years old, so I wasn't sure how this was going to work with my older TV. I'm not too tech savvy and my husband is worse so he usually lets me do the tech troubleshooting, but he was able to set this up in less than 10 min. The quality and picture is clear and sharp. After briefly streaming a couple of channels to test, I thought to myself (how fun this is going to be), and I swear that as I was putting away the packaging and box, the Roku box has my same thought written on its box, This is gonna be fun.
